details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.1.11 Embedded files - EmbeddedFiles tree
details.description: A file's name dictionary, as defined in PDF Reference 3.6.3, shall not contain the EmbeddedFiles key

rule.description: A file's name dictionary, as defined in PDF Reference 3.6.3, shall not contain the EmbeddedFiles key

error.message: The document contains embedded files (EmbeddedFiles key is present in the file's name dictionary)
